description:
We are the managing agent for Heybridge Court. At the rear of the car park, it is surrounded by large trees (several conifers) that have grown very tall and require works. The grounds look untidy and risk of the trees getting worse in condition if not treated. Trees are also damaging the cars that park on site. 

Photos and plans of the specific area available - we can send the information via email.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: We are the managing agent for Heybridge Court. At the rear of the car park, it is surrounded by large trees (several conifers) that have grown very tall and require works. The grounds look untidy and risk of the trees getting worse in condition if not treated. Trees are also damaging the cars that park on site.
Photos and plans of the specific area available - we can send the information via email.

Insufficient information provided to determine the works to be undertaken. Please resubmit the application including a clear, detailed description of the work to be carried out to each tree or group of trees, including measurements where possible.
